bug.short_desc: Scrollbars and ALL other widgets are positioning on the wrong side for RTL locales

long_desc.thetext:
through cldr data you know what locale is RTL and by that you should position the
1) scrollbars on the left inside the controllers. Now it is a blocker! 2) atoms with the image on the right side of the text 3) checkbox with the box to the right of the text 4) colorpopup mirrored 5) colorselector mirrored 6) combobox mirrored 7) datechooser mirrored 8) datefield mirrored 9) desktop mirrored 10) window caption mirrored 11) labels mirrored ...... and all other widgets
We have already implemented RTL for almost all widgets. We are now trying to conform with the upcoming release so it is in sync...
Do you want this code?
Sure! Can't promis when we are going to take a look at it but go ahead and attach a patch for it. :)
A contribution called qooxdoo-rtl contributed by us makes qooxdoo rtl compatible.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
